mode.name: group_admins
mode.query: SELECT wc.id AS ID, wc.login, NVL((SELECT MAX(1) FROM rhnUserManagedServerGroups USGP WHERE USGP.server_group_id = :sgid AND USGP.user_id = wc.id), 0) AS IS_ADMIN FROM web_contact wc WHERE wc.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY wc.login_uc, wc.id

mode.name: users_in_org
mode.query: SELECT wc.id AS ID, wc.login, wc.login_uc FROM web_contact wc WHERE wc.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY wc.login_uc, wc.id

mode.name: support_users_in_org
mode.query: SELECT wc.id AS ID, wc.login, wc.login_uc FROM web_contact wc WHERE wc.org_id = :support_org_id ORDER BY wc.login_uc, wc.id

mode.name: support_find_user
mode.query: SELECT WC.org_id, WC.login, WC.id, PI.email FROM web_contact WC, web_user_personal_info PI WHERE (WC.login_uc LIKE UPPER(:search_str) OR PI.email LIKE :search_str) AND WC.id = PI.web_user_id

mode.name: user_details
mode.query: SELECT UIOO.user_id AS id, UIOO.user_login, UIOO.user_first_name, UIOO.user_last_name, WUPI.email FROM rhnUsersInOrgOverview UIOO, web_user_personal_info WUPI WHERE UIOO.org_id = :org_id AND WUPI.web_user_id = UIOO.user_id ORDER BY UPPER(user_login), UIOO.user_id

datasource_modes.query: SELECT UIOO.user_id as id, user_login, user_first_name, user_last_name, role_names, server_count, server_group_count, TO_CHAR(last_logged_in, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') last_logged_in FROM rhnUsersInOrgOverview UIOO, rhnUserInfo UI WHERE UIOO.user_id IN (%s) AND UI.user_id = UIOO.user_id ORDER BY UPPER(user_login), UIOO.user_id

mode.name: available_timezones
mode.query: SELECT id, olson_name OLSON, display_name DESCRIPTION FROM rhnTimezone ORDER BY display_name
